neatTheSpire:neatTheSpireMagneticOrb.NAME: Magnetic
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, draw #b
NL Magnetic passive is unaffected by #yFocus

neatTheSpire:neatTheSpireLightOrb.NAME: Light
DESCRIPTION: Transforms itself into a different #yOrb depending on the next one you #yChannel. NL Lightning -> Magnetic. NL Magnetic -> Lightning. NL Frost -> Dark. NL Dark -> Frost. NL Other -> Plasma.

neatTheSpire:neatTheSpireLightOrbTwo.NAME: LightTwo
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the end of turn, increases this Orb's #yBlock by #b
